title: Here, Now, and Always: Voices of the First Peoples of the Southwest
description: This book—companion to a permanent exhibit at the Museum of Indian Arts and Culture in Santa Fe, New Mexico—is an inspirational collection of Native thoughts on place, history, tradition, and change. The voices represent Indian scholars, artists, and writers from various Southwestern tribes speaking to themes of origin, cycles, community, and survival.
author: Rina Swentzell
